faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Etimad is a leading financial services company providing financing solutions to individuals with a highly skilled professional team and a customer-focused approach.

q1.question: How do I apply for financing?
q1.answer: Etimad Finance was founded in 2023 to provide Sharia-compliant financial solutions for individuals, following the rules and regulations issued by the Saudi Central Bank regarding micro consumer finance.

certifications.title: Our Products Comply with Islamic Sharia Law
certifications.description1: Providing Sharia-compliant products is one of the top priorities of Tamam Finance.
certifications.description2: We continuously work with a team of Sharia experts specializing in Islamic finance to ensure all our services comply with Sharia principles.
certifications.description3: Experts review and audit all transactions regularly to ensure ongoing compliance with Islamic Sharia law.
